thread.title: Shahid and Alia spotted at Mumbai's famous Mehboob studios | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: Shahid and Alia spotted at Mumbai's famous Mehboob studios | Deccan Chronicle

author: Deccan
title: Shahid and Alia spotted at Mumbai's famous Mehboob studios | Deccan Chronicle
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 01, 2015, 18.23 pm Mumbai: Shahid Kapoor and his leading lady Alia Bhatt have officially kicked off ‘Shaandar’ promotions. The two Bollywood stars were photographed leaving Mumbai’s Mehboob studios last evening. After their successful trailer launch (that is on it’s way to the 10 million mark on YouTube) and the release of three super hit songs that have already become popular party anthems, the two stars will officially stars making public appearances to promote their film. The elaborate song and dance sequences accompanied with hilarious behind the scenes videos, have all added to the hype and anticipation for the film. This film will see Shahid and Alia share screen space for the very first time. While Shahid will be seen playing the role of a wedding planner, Alia on the other hand will play his client. The actor has said in a recent interview that preparing for his role helped him plan his own wedding. After ‘Shaandar’, Alia and Shahid will be seen again in ‘Udta Punjab’, that will also star Kareena Kapoor Khan and Diljit Dosanjh.
